item.title: EP 1006 - Whisper Through The Flames
item.itunes:title: Whisper Through The Flames
item.description:
Today we join the Sheriff’s department and fight an unknown force, and then we travel to Paso Robles Inn and meet a ghost who is trying to save our lives!
